xldoc.description: An approach to a broad postivist synthesis
xldoc.keywords: rbjones logic philosophy positivism metaphysics utopia

section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: A philosophical synthesis from elements of the rational/empiricist and the romantic/existential aspects of western philosophy, overlaid on a substratum which is sceptical and expressionistic. In its less romantic elements the positiion is sceptical and inj some respects positivistic, but the philosophy is also I hope, positive in a more ordinary sense.

secref.title: Logic and Emotion, Rationality and Romanticism

section.title: Logic and Emotion, Rationality and Romanticism
Philosophy as Art
section.abstract: A conception of philosophy in terms of its purpose, methods, form and content, which is closer in some ways to literary art than it is to most other philosophy.
